alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 4:33AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL DOOR COUNTY THROUGH 500 AM CST... At 433 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Egg Harbor, or 16 miles east of Marinette, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonport, Ephraim, Egg Harbor, Newport State Park, Baileys Harbor, Sister Bay, Peninsula Center, Fish Creek, Peninsula State Park, and Ellison Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
